name: ticket
description: The tracking number within the system. May be project specific, is sequentially assigned upon receipt.

name: Journal
description: Journal associated with an issue and manuscript. Derived from the manuscript number, possibly updated by hand

name: Status
description: Status associated with a ticket at any point in time. The schema for these has changed over time.

name: Changed.Fields
description: A transaction will change various fields. These are listed here.

name: Change.Author.Anon
description: The author ID associated with a change of field values

name: mc_number_anon
description: The (anonymized) number assigned by the editorial workflow system (Manuscript Central/ ScholarOne) to a manuscript. This is purged by a script of any revision suffixes, and is used to connect tickets over time when there are revisions.
